resources.string:
This application simulates a Simon Says Game.

The first player will enter a pattern of presses equivalent to the number shown in the clicks label. Afterwards, he will hand the device over to the second player, who will try to imitate the previous pattern. If the second player succeeds, both patterns will be displayed equally on the bottom of the screen (If visible on your device).

If the second player presses an incorrect key, both patterns will appear on the bottom of the screen up until the part of the pattern where the second player did not match the first.
Determine the amount of clicks used to generate the simon says pattern.
